clinical_study.brief_title: Cosmetic Outcome, Patient-reported Outcomes, and Reconstruction-related Complications in Breast Cancer Women Treated With or Without Post-mastectomy Radiation Therapy: Prospective Cohort Study
clinical_study.official_title: Cosmetic Outcome, Patient-reported Outcomes, and Reconstruction-related Complications in Breast Cancer Women Treated With or Without Post-mastectomy Radiation Therapy: Prospective Cohort Study

brief_summary.textblock: This study aim to investigate the breast reconstruction outcome after mastectomy with or without radiation therapy from the patient's point of view.

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline of Breast-Q questionnaire score
primary_outcome.time_frame: Before mastectomy & reconstruction surgery (allowed up to 8 weeks ago)
primary_outcome.description: Patient reported outcome measures include psychosocial functioning, patient treatment satisfaction, physical functioning, body image and pain. (Breast-Q survey)

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline of Breast-Q questionnaire score
primary_outcome.time_frame: Immediate after the last reconstructive procedures/surgery (allowed plus 8 weeks)
primary_outcome.description: Patient reported outcome measures include psychosocial functioning, patient treatment satisfaction, physical functioning, body image and pain. (Breast-Q survey)

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline of Breast-Q questionnaire score
primary_outcome.time_frame: 1 year after the last reconstructive procedures/surgery (allowed plus 8 weeks)
primary_outcome.description: Patient reported outcome measures include psychosocial functioning, patient treatment satisfaction, physical functioning, body image and pain. (Breast-Q survey)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: within 1 year after last reconstruction procedures (plus 8 weeks)
secondary_outcome.description: Patient reported outcome measures include psychosocial functioning, patient treatment satisfaction, physical functioning, body image and pain. (Breast-Q survey)

intervention.description: All sorts of breast reconstructive surgery are allowed in this study in terms of timing, autologous/prosthetic and so forth.

study_pop.textblock: Women undergoing reconstruction surgery after mastectomy at an academic center

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Pathologically confirmed invasive breast carcinoma
- Women who underwent mastectomy and breast reconstruction
- Good performance status (ECOG 0-1)
Exclusion Criteria:
- Recurrent breast cancer
- History of ipsilateral breast irradiation
